ActiveDataset.Name: Active Dataset
ActiveDataset.Hint: Currently loaded trading dataset. Changing this will reload all settlement and cargo data.

CurrentSeason.Name: Current Season
CurrentSeason.Hint: Current trading season for price calculations. This affects all cargo pricing throughout the system.

ChatVisibility.Name: Chat Message Visibility
ChatVisibility.Hint: Controls who can see trading dice rolls and transaction results in chat.

DialogPosition.Name: Dialog Position
DialogPosition.Hint: Remembers the position and size of the trading dialog window.

DebugLogging.Name: Debug Logging
DebugLogging.Hint: Enable detailed logging for troubleshooting. Only enable if requested by support.

Notifications.SeasonChanged: Trading season changed to {season}. All prices updated.
Notifications.SystemCompatibilityWarning: System '{system}' may not be fully supported. Configuration may need adjustment.
Notifications.WelcomeMessage: Welcome to Trading Places! Check the module settings to configure your trading system.

Errors.NoSeason: Please set the current season before trading
Errors.NoCargoAvailable: No cargo available at this settlement
Errors.FoundryVersionTooOld: FoundryVTT version {minVersion} or higher required. Current version: {currentVersion}
